form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition for Alien Relative, Form I-130 ( (Rev. 10/01/89) Y

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/17/2023 U.S. Department of Justice $75.00 Immigration and Naturalization Service (INS) Petition for Alien Relative Instructions Read the instructions carefully. If you do not follow the instructions, we may have to return your petition, which may delay final action. If more space is needed to complete an answer continue on separate sheet of paper. 1. Who can file? 4. What documents do you need?
